title: Home
description: Dedicated board-certified practitioners of Acupuncture, Herbal Therapy, & Qigong. Treatments based on whole person Body Mind Spirit healing.
cleaned_text: If you are passionate about seeking Body, Mind, Spirit Health, we share an important energy connection. Deep within, your intuition is letting you know there is something meaningful for you here. At Tao of Healing, everything we do is based on Qi or vital energy, consciousness and the understanding of interrelationships. Each aspect of your being—body, mind and spirit—are inseparable and must cooperate fully for optimum health. Our dedicated team of licensed practitioners will guide you every step of the way using only traditional Chinese medicine techniques.
